string-array.name: binaural_descriptions
string-array.item: Dreamy piano and soft voices combined with subliminal binaural tones (theta wave).
Deeply relaxing beats and flowing melody.
Powerful ambient music with subliminal binaural tones (theta wave) for meditation and deep trance.
Soulful voices and djembe combine in a piece inspired by the healing harmony of plainsong.
Relaxing rhythms and beautiful natural sounds.
An evolving ambient soundscape with a soft flowing melody and gentle rhythmic pulse.
Gentle sounds of breath in a tranquill setting.
Uplifting voices weave through a tranquil setting.
Voices drift peacefully on the breeze - a track inspired by the open harmony of plain song.
Blissful natural sounds: Gentle waves and soft voices combine with subliminal binaural beats (theta wave).
